description: Pupils currently in Years 2, 6, 10 and 12 will be the first to return, the education minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man's schools 'could reopen from 17 June'
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man's schools 'could reopen from 17 June' - BBC News
maintext: Those in "transition" classes - Years 2, 6, 10 and 12 - will be the first to join the vulnerable pupils and key workers' children who have remained at school during the Covid-19 outbreak.
